Sentencas: The development of cathode materials with high catalytic activity and low cost is a challenge for CO2 electrolysis based on solid oxide electrolysis cells.
Titulo: Enhancing CO2 Catalytic Adsorption on an Fe Nanoparticle-Decorated LaSrFeO4+ δ Cathode for CO2 Electrolysis

Sentencas: Herein, we report a low-cost and highly active metallic Fe nanoparticle-decorated Ruddlesden-Popper (La, Sr)FeO4+delta cathode catalyst (Fe-RPLSF), which shows a high oxygen vacancy concentration and robust CO2 reduction rate.
Titulo: Enhancing CO2 Catalytic Adsorption on an Fe Nanoparticle-Decorated LaSrFeO4+ δ Cathode for CO2 Electrolysis

Sentencas: At 850 degrees C, the current density of the electrolysis cell with the Fe-RPLSF cathode reaches -1920 mA cm(-2) at a voltage of 1.5 V, and the Faraday efficiency is as high as 100%.
Titulo: Enhancing CO2 Catalytic Adsorption on an Fe Nanoparticle-Decorated LaSrFeO4+ δ Cathode for CO2 Electrolysis

Sentencas: The polarization resistance at low frequency (0.1-10 Hz), which is the rate-limit step for CO2 electrolysis, significantly decreases with the exsolved Fe nanoparticles because of improved CO2 dissociative adsorption.
Titulo: Enhancing CO2 Catalytic Adsorption on an Fe Nanoparticle-Decorated LaSrFeO4+ δ Cathode for CO2 Electrolysis

Sentencas: Moreover, our electrolysis cell demonstrates acceptable short-term stability for direct CO2 electrolysis.
Titulo: Enhancing CO2 Catalytic Adsorption on an Fe Nanoparticle-Decorated LaSrFeO4+ δ Cathode for CO2 Electrolysis
